name: Thames Rover (3 days or 7 days)
description:
THAMES ROVER Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions along the Thames Valley and beyond for either 3 consecutive days or 7 consecutive days. It extends from Moreton-in-Marsh and Banbury in the north to Basingstoke, Guildford and Redhill in the south and from Bedwyn in the west to London Paddington in the east and 
      encompasses Reading, Didcot, Oxford and Newbury plus the Thames Valley branch lines to Greenford, Windsor & Eton Central, Bourne End/Marlow and Henley-on-Thames.
